db:abstract.db:para: Provides classes for network authorization support (OAuth).

db:article.db:para: Provides classes for network authorization support (OAuth).

db:listitem.db:para: The QAbstractOAuth class is the base of all implementations of OAuth authentication methods.
The QAbstractOAuth2 class is the base of all implementations of OAuth 2 authentication methods.
Handles replies to OAuth authentication requests.
The QOAuth1 class provides an implementation of the OAuth 1 Protocol.
The QOAuth2AuthorizationCodeFlow class provides an implementation of the Authorization Code Grant flow.
